description:
Welcome to LHDC Debrecen Airport in Microsoft Flight Simulator! üåç This addon by LH Simulations brings Hungary's second-largest airport to life with stunning detail and realism. Featuring handcrafted airport objects, high-resolution textures with Physically Based Rendering (PBR), and custom ground textures, every aspect of Debrecen Airport has been meticulously designed to provide an immersive flying experience. Whether you're navigating commercial flights or cargo operations, LHDC Debrecen Airport offers a captivating environment for all aviation enthusiasts. Download now and elevate your flight simulation adventures! üöÄ
